attributes.action: help bring back the Eurovision jury in order to stop the political voting and make it fairer to all participants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order for the Eurovision Song Contest to become fairer, we the undersigned wish for either the jury voting system to be brought back or for a 50/50 jury/televoting voting system to be instigated

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
